title: The Hundred: ECB and eight franchises reaffirm commitment to inclusive competition

title: Court throws out OSP case against Dr Sledge
desc: An Accra High Court has dismissed an application filed by the Office of the Special Prosecutor (OSP), which sought confirmation of the freezing of assets belonging to business mogul Dr Sledge and Goldridge Refinery Ltd.
